name: bidirectional
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
going in two directions or having parts that go in two directions, usually opposite from each other: We used a bidirectional channel that was able to send and receive signals at the same time. The traffic on the boulevard is bidirectional, with north and south lanes separated by a median strip.
More examplesFewer examplesImaging revealed bidirectional blood flow in the renal arteries of 16 of the 25 patients examined who had the condition. The company places great importance on open, bidirectional communication between management and employees.
